We will be conducting a min investigation in to airBnB lettings as new legislation sets a cap on short term letting to only 90 days. There is not enough info to enforce this so it needs to be improved. There are several ways to do this.

## RPubs

Rpubs is one of the more straighforward publishing tools that takes your .Rmd files and uploads them to their website where it is publically avaiable. 

You first need to create an account with RPubs.

Then create a new RMarkdown file.
